mapper.sql: C.ID_TEMPLATE_DETAIL as id_template_detail, C.ID_TEMPLATE as id_template, C.KETERANGAN as keterangan, C.TEMPLATE_SMS as template_sms, C.TEMPLATE_WEB as template_web, C.TEMPLATE_SUBJECT as template_subject, C.TEMPLATE_EMAIL as template_email, C.F_AKTIF as f_aktif, C.USER_CREATE as user_create, C.TGL_CREATE as tgl_create, C.USER_UPDATE as user_update, C.TGL_UPDATE as tgl_update

WHERE 1=1 AND ( keterangan like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR template_sms like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR template_web like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR template_subject like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR template_email like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_update like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message_template_detail ( ID_TEMPLATE_DETAIL, ID_TEMPLATE, KETERANGAN, TEMPLATE_SMS, TEMPLATE_WEB, TEMPLATE_SUBJECT, TEMPLATE_EMAIL, F_AKTIF, USER_CREATE, TGL_CREATE, USER_UPDATE, TGL_UPDATE ) values ( #{id_template_detail, JDBCTYPE=INTEGER}, #{id_template, JDBCTYPE=INTEGER}, #{keterangan}, #{template_sms}, #{template_web}, #{template_subject}, #{template_email}, #{f_aktif, JDBCTYPE=INTEGER}, #{user_create}, #{tgl_create}, #{user_update}, #{tgl_update} )
